segments.text: You did an excellent job in this project .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . It was a lot of hard work.But I'm glad I did it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When will you give me a raise ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel quite embarrassed for having to request a pay raise so quickly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me think . How much did you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a lot of money . Let me think about it carefully .
segments.speaker: S1
